Name: You have defeated a Neither
Description: It will stop wriggling soon. Soon. Any moment now.

DefaultEvent.Name: The Bends
DefaultEvent.Description: Of course, there's no way that you could actually hear the shouts. Not through the airlock, the hull, the yards of water. Never mind the crew members who swore that they could hear every shriek and whimper of the divers you sent out into the corpse-water. And besides, from what you saw, there wasn't time for screaming. The dark slick gathered around their diving-suits, enfolding them like a cloak. You glimpsed one terror-contorted face through the glass of their helmet as they were bundled up in darkness, and then it was over. Only a little flotsam remained; the water was clear, as though the Neither had never been.

ChildBranches.Name: Send crew into the carrion-slick
ChildBranches.Description: The body is liquefying and spreading. Soon it will be nothing but a swirl of shadowed water. If you want to search the remains, you must act now.

DefaultEvent.Name: Fogged glass
DefaultEvent.Description: Your ship's lamps sparked strange twinkles in the spreading remains of the Neither. When you looked closer, within the blackness you could see an unfamiliar sky, grasping trees, the cries of hostile birds. But now only clear water remains. The battle is over, isn't it? Of course. In any case, the thing is dead. Yes. You tear yourself from the porthole.

ChildBranches.Name: Continue shining a light upon it
ChildBranches.Description: Never trust anything that seems in a hurry to die.
